ourProgramsArray.title: Education & Skill Development
ourProgramsArray.body: Every individual deserves the right to learn and grow. Schools for the blind and disabled provide Braille education, while vocational training in computers, arts, and crafts helps them build confidence and independence.

ourProgramsArray.title: Health & Wellness
ourProgramsArray.body: Good health is the foundation of a fulfilling life. Free medical camps offer essential checkups, while prosthetic limbs, crutches, and mobility aids restore dignity and freedom of movement.

ourProgramsArray.title: Self-Employment & Job Opportunities
ourProgramsArray.body: Everyone deserves a chance to earn a living with dignity. We support self-employment and job training programs, helping individuals with disabilities find meaningful work and financial stability

ourProgramsArray.title: Sports & Cultural Activities
ourProgramsArray.body: Sports and arts bring joy, confidence, and a sense of belonging. From chess tournaments for the blind to music and dance programs, we nurture talents and celebrate abilities.

ourProgramsArray.title: Rural Development & Outreach
ourProgramsArray.body: No one should be left behind, no matter where they live. We bring resources, training, and awareness campaigns to rural communities, ensuring equal opportunities for all.

ourProgramsArray.title: Food & Shelter Support
ourProgramsArray.body: A warm meal and a safe place to stay can change lives. We provide free food and hostel accommodations, offering comfort and security to those in need.
